overview.en: Exrelay is a distributed, non-authorized, extensible, open and Shared order book trading  relay node network based on the decentralized matchmaking of ethereum assets, covering exchange,  leverage, fiat currency, futures, options and data matchmaking..
overview.zh: ExRelay 是一个基于 以太坊资产去中心化撮合交易而建立的分布式、无任何授权、可扩展、开放式、共享订单薄的交易中继节点网络， 业务覆盖于，兑汇、杠杆、法币、期货、期权，数据撮合交易等。
